mapper.select: SELECT last_insert_rowid() FROM user_tag WHERE rowid = (SELECT last_insert_rowid())

select t.TAG_ID,t.Tag_NAME,count(1) from user_resource_tag c join user_resource r on c.RESOURCE_ID=r.RESOURCE_ID join user_tag t on c.TAG_ID=t.TAG_ID and t.USER_ID=c.USER_ID where c.USER_ID = #{userId} group by t.TAG_ID,t.Tag_NAME order by count(1) desc limit #{limit}

select t.TAG_ID,t.Tag_NAME from user_resource_tag c join user_resource r on c.RESOURCE_ID=r.RESOURCE_ID join user_tag t on c.TAG_ID=t.TAG_ID and t.USER_ID=c.USER_ID where c.USER_ID = #{userId} and c.RESOURCE_ID=#{resourceId}
